title: New Cirque du Soleil Show in Ottawa: Presale Ends Tonight
text:
Premium ... $115 
Child, senior, student and military pricing is also available. 
The show brings the fantasy world of Pandora to the live stage, and envisions a world thousands of years before the film takes place. 
Travelzoo Tip: Click here for Travelzoo's guide to Cirque du Soleil shows. New Cirque du Soleil Show in Ottawa: Presale $ New June 30 - July 3; presale ends Oct. 15 New Cirque du Soleil Show in Ottawa: Presale Ends Tonight * Tweet By Bethany Voyt 
"TORUK -- The First Flight" is a brand-new Cirque du Soleil show inspired by the Academy Award-winning film "AVATAR." With this deal, get first pick of seats and l ock in tickets before they go on sale to the general public on Oct. 16. 
The following seating levels are available at Canadian Tire Centre in Ottawa for Thursday-Sunday performances, June 30 - July 3: Category 4 ... $45
